title: Blitzcrank has no place in ARAM
body:
when you have 3 routes you can take, or 5, then sure, blitzcrank away,... but when you are forced to go down the center in ARAM it makes no sense to even have blitz on the field. So the entire game from round one of minions blitz starts fishing and its immediately 5v1..... before we can level up once its 0-9 kills.....repeat over and over and over and over until the end of the game. Blitz has no place in ARAM..... the game was utterly pointless.

10/10.... will leave all future ARAM games with blitz in it

replies.body: what is playing safe? or dodging?  those are serious dkills that aram teaches
yep gotta learn to dodge and anticipate
